/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a tranquil scene of a street in Beijing, China. The street, bathed in the warm glow of the sun, is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. A black car is parked on the right side of the street, its sleek form contrasting with the rustic charm of the surroundings. On the left side of the street, a white building stands tall, its facade adorned with a green awning that adds a splash of color to the scene. The perspective of the image is from the middle of the street, looking towards the building, giving a sense of depth and dimension to the scene. The image captures the essence of a sunny day in Beijing, where nature and urban life coexist harmoniously.
